name: FormulaRecalcResult

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: If an error occurs during formula recalculation, an array of one or more database error objects, along with error codes and descriptions, is returned.

methods.name: getSObject
methods.description: Returns the sObject with formulas recalculated.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Returns a Boolean value that is set to true if the formula recalculation process completed successfully; otherwise, it is set to false.

description: The return type of the Formula.recalculateFormulas method.
